term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - excitation energy in in situ microanalysis
term.title: excitation energy

item.text: Sometimes called acceleration energy or initial energy. Kinetic energy of bombarding particles at the surface of the solid.

sources.item: PAC, 1983, 55, 2023. 'Nomenclature, symbols and units recommended for in situ microanalysis (Provisional)' on page 2027 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198355122023)
